machine_start_gcode.default_value:
G21 ;metric values
G90 ;absolute positioning
M82 ;set extruder to absolute mode
M107 ;start with the fan off
M140 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0}
M104 S160
G1 X10 Y10 Z50 F900
M190 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0}
M109 S160
G4 P18000 ;pause
BED_MESH_CALIBRATE PRINT_MIN=%MINX%,%MINY% PRINT_MAX=%MAXX%,%MAXY% ;auto bed level
G1 Z3 F1200 ;move the platform up 3mm
G1 X0 Y0 F12000
G1 Z0 F1200 ;move the platform down
M104 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0}
M109 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0}
G1 Z3 F6000 ;move the platform up 3mm
G92 E0 ;zero the extruded length
;intro line
G1 X0 Y0 F5000
G1 Z0.2 F2000
G1 X50 E10 F1500
G1 X100 E18 F1000
G92 E0

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
M104 S0 ;extruder heater off
M140 S0 ;heated bed heater off
G91 ;relative positioning
G1 E-1 F300  ;retract the filament
G1 Z+0.5 E-5 X-20 Y-20 F9000 ;move Z up a bit and retract
G28 X0 Y0 Z0 ;move X/Y to min endstops
G90 ;absolute positioning
